content: **in this episode ** lily chin shows how to use your knitting needles to create crochet stitches how to knit a chain stitch and treble stitch and how to change colors pattern includes instruction for either **straight needles holder** or **double-pointed needle cozy** each ball of yarn will make at least six double-pointed holders **finished sizes ** straight needles holder = 11 wide x 12 tall total double-pointed needles holder = variable diameters/circumferences x 4 tall **gauge ** 6 treble_crochet row = 5 32 sts in patt 2 treble_crochet chain-1 = 9 18 single_crochet = 5 4 single_crochet row = 1 **also needed ** dental floss for seaming darning or tapestry needle former diy website url http //www diynetwork com/diy/na_knitting/article/0 2025 diy_14141_5501954 00 html pattern available through wayback machine/internet archive
